subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jason Taylor, a six-time Pro Bowl defensive end, wants to play one more season, even if it is with the Dolphins. Taylor denied reports Sunday that he demanded to be traded from Miami, but he said for the first time that if Miami wanted to move him, he would be receptive. “Do I want to be here?” he said. “Yeah, I’d love to be here. I would love to be a Dolphin and win games and have it work out for everybody. But that may not be the case.”.
